headline: Expedia Group’s AI Shift And Tiqets Deal Weighed Against Valuation Gap
summary: Expedia Group is pushing ahead with its AI plans, framing artificial intelligence as the company's third chapter after internet and mobile. The company is progressing toward acquiring Tiqets, a platform for tours and activities, to expand its travel offerings. These moves are intended to reshape how travelers search, book, and experience trips across Expedia's ecosystem. For investors watching NasdaqGS:EXPE, the focus is shifting from traditional hotel and flight bookings toward a broader...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Expedia Group (EXPE) After A 56% One Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Expedia Group's share price still offers value after a strong run, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you weigh that up calmly. The stock last closed at US$264.84. While returns over the past 7 days and 30 days show declines of 2.3% and 6.5%, the 1 year and 3 year returns of 56.2% and 124.9% highlight how much the share price has already moved. Recent news around Expedia Group has focused on its role as a major online travel platform and how it...

headline: A Look At Expedia Group (EXPE) Valuation After Strong Earnings And Analyst Optimism
summary: Expedia Group (EXPE) is back in focus after its latest earnings report, where room nights, gross bookings, revenue, and B2B bookings all came in ahead of expectations, alongside adjusted EBITDA margin expansion. See our latest analysis for Expedia Group. At a share price of $264.84, Expedia has given investors a 20.38% 90 day share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 56.17% and 3 year total shareholder return of 124.92% point to momentum that, despite recent short term...
